name: Twistling
description:
Welcome to Twisling!  Twist your fingers to press or hold the different buttons and save our little guy.  Ready for the challenge?

This game was design for the 20 sec Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam).

Music by: Denos

 https://itch.io/profile/denosx12

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmj9dTfaFB8kCc-a59XHbAg

Art by: mmkhlv

https://itch.io/profile/mmkhlv

Thank you for playing! Leave a comment with your feedback below, I would love to hear your comments about the game.
